advancements.advanced_note: Group winners in League A advanced to Nations League Finals
advancements.relegated_note: The fourth-placed teams in League A relegated to League B

matches.awarded_text: Awarded: The Switzerland vs Ukraine match was awarded as a 3–0 win to Switzerland after being cancelled as Ukraine were placed in quarantine prior to the match due to positive SARS-CoV-2 tests in the team.

advancements.advanced_note: Group winners in League B promoted to League A
advancements.relegated_note: The fourth-placed teams in League B relegated to League C

matches.awarded_text: Awarded: The Romania vs Norway match was awarded as a 3–0 win to Romania after being cancelled as Norway could not travel to the match due to a positive SARS-CoV-2 test in the team.

advancements.advanced_note: Group winners in League C promoted to League B
advancements.relegated_note: The fourth-placed teams in League C participated in Relegation play-outs

advancements.advanced_note: Group winners in League D promoted to League C
